description: Completion of a 'project and research skills' component along with one lecture topic chosen from the fourth-year offerings as approved by the coordinator. A list of the fourth-year lecture and project topics is available at enrolment. The 'project and research skills' component can take one of two forms: A major research project, in which the student is expected to contribute new results to the field of mathematics; A reading project, in which the student completes their mathematical background, along with a series of modules to develop research skills.Both types of projects contain a literature review component.
